## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the appropriate option with an "x" -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (ruff check passes)
- [ ] I have added type hints to new public functions/methods
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new public functions/methods
- [ ] I have not introduced any new linting warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All existing tests pass locally (`pytest tests/ -v`)
- [ ] I have tested on Python 3.10+

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for public APIs

### Security
- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not hardcoded any secrets or credentials
- [ ] My changes do not expose sensitive data
